comments.comments_text: Alex McCarthy was forced into action to thwart Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City). He found himself some space after latching on to a pass and unleashed a shot to the bottom left corner but couldn't beat the keeper. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Manchester City.
